name: Easy and Delicious Chili Powder Mixture
description: This a great chili powder combo to experiment with.  Tons of flavor and it can be used anywhere you use your regular chili powder.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup crushed New Mexican chile (I used Big Jim variety)

recipeInstructions.text: Add ingredients to a mixing bowl and combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ingredients to a mixing bowl and combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: Use immediately and store leftovers in an airtight container along with your other spices.
